info.description:
REST API for the API Catalog service which is a component of the API Mediation Layer. Use this API to retrieve information regarding catalog dashboard tiles, tile contents and its status, API documentation and status for the registered services.

[Swagger/OpenAPI JSON Document](https://usilca32.lvn.broadcom.net:60004/apicatalog/api/v1/apidoc/apicatalog/v1)
info.title: API Catalog

get.summary: Retrieves the API documentation for a specific service version
get.description: Returns the API documentation for a specific service {serviceId} and version {apiVersion}. When  the API documentation for the specified version is not found, the first discovered version will be used.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: The major version of the API documentation (v1, v2, etc.)

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the registered service

get.description: Returns a list of tiles including status and tile description

get.summary: Retrieves a specific dashboard tile information
get.description: Returns information for a specific tile {id} including status and tile description

get.summary: Retrieve diff of two api versions for a specific service
get.description: Returns an HTML document which details the difference between two versions of a API service

parameters.name: apiVersion1
parameters.description: The major version of the API documentation (v1, v2, etc.)

parameters.name: apiVersion2
parameters.description: The major version of the API documentation (v1, v2, etc.)

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the registered service

services.description: A collection of services which are registered with this API

sso.description: The SSO support of all services and instances in the container

version.description: The version of the API container

apiDoc.description: The API documentation for this service

apiId.description: The API ID for this service

apiVersions.description: The available API versions for this service

basePath.description: The service API base path of the API service

defaultApiVersion.description: The default API version for this service

description.description: The description of the API service

gatewayUrls.description: The Gateway URLs used within this service

homePageUrl.description: The service home page of the API service

secured.description: The security status of the API service

sso.description: The SSO support for this instance

ssoAllInstances.description: The SSO support for all instances

status.description: The status of the API service
